com.jalapeno
Class ApplicationContext

java.lang.Object
  com.jalapeno.ApplicationContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObjectManagerFactory
public class ApplicationContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements ObjectManagerFactory

Implements different connection options to connect to database and obtain an instance of ObjectManager.

defaultSettings

public Settings defaultSettings()
Description copied from interface: ObjectManagerFactory
Provides interface to define application-wide settings for ObjectManagers. Settings include Fetch Policy, Client Cache Type, default ClassLoader.

Settings also can be configured for individual ObjectManager instances.

Specified by:
defaultSettings in interface ObjectManagerFactory
Returns:
an instance of Settings used by this ObjectManagerFactory
See Also:
ObjectManager.settings()

createObjectManager

public ObjectManager createObjectManager(java.lang.String mode)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
Creates an instance of ObjectManager of a particular type.

Parameters:
mode - A string specifying what kind of ObjectManager should be created. For Cache valid values are "full" and "light".
Returns:
a newly created instance of ObjectManager.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
